name: Paperguy
description:
Peter and I made this game for Radius Game Jam 2016 in about 3 days. The theme was "no connection", so imagine a world without internet where the only job you can get is delivering papers to houses.

Click on the rotating squares at the right moment to throw papers.

Buy upgrades by clicking on the square icons on the bottom left.

Upgrades:

  • more speed
  • more money
  • different houses
  • speed regeneration

Tweet to @shinypixelgames if you like this game.
